H0.text: What was the middle name of Senator Edward M Kennedy, who died in August 2009. Francis

H1.text: What was the middle name of Senator Edward M Kennedy, who died in August 2009. Joseph

H2.text: What was the middle name of Senator Edward M Kennedy, who died in August 2009. Patrick

H3.text: What was the middle name of Senator Edward M Kennedy, who died in August 2009. MOORE

A4.text: Edward Moore Kennedy was born at St. Margaret's Hospital in the Dorchester section of Boston, Massachusetts on February 22, 1932.
